title: Nike's Jordan Brand Signs NBA's Top Draft Pick
itunes:title: Nike's Jordan Brand Signs NBA's Top Draft Pick
description:
The NBA's number one overall draft pick, Paolo Banchero, signed a deal with Nike's Jordan Brand, putting him in company with some of the sport's greats. Hosts Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Damian Sassower are joined by Bloomberg's Kim Bhasin to discuss the new deal. Plus, they talk about Kevin Durant's pickleball plans.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
